title: The materials genome in action: identifying the performance limits for methane storage
excerpt: In this Perspective, we have collected and compared on a consistent basis the methane uptake in over 650â€†000 existing and predicted materials using molecular simulations. The results suggest that it may be difficult to reach the (at the time) current Advanced Research Project Agency-Energy (ARPA-E) target for natural gas storage.
citation: Simon, Cory M. (2015). "The materials genome in action: identifying the performance limits for methane storage." Energy Environ. Sci.. 8. 1190-1199.
